content: I'm sorry, I am a machine learning model and I don't have the ability to know the age of the customer avatar "Sam" as it's just a representation of a type of customer. But I can provide you with a general demographic information based on the values and behavior of the person who could be represented by this avatar. Sam could be of any age, but it's likely that they are someone who is older than 21 and is interested in coffee culture and enjoys the technical aspects of brewing.
